name: Campusmanage
short_description:
Campusmanage is an advanced web based institute management system offering high flexibility and an abundance of features to collaboratively create quality education system.Campus Manage, designed specifically by experienced educators, to meet the hands-on demands of real Training Institutes.

We are glad to introduce our latest product Campus Manage (online training institute management software). This product had been developed by expertise web developers with enormous requirements and needs gathered from various training institutes across the world.
The Modules of our product are
1.Course 2.Batch 3.Hr 4.Enquiry 5.Student 6.Billing 7.Attendance, 8.Library 9.E-mail 10.Sms 11.Identity Card generation 12.Placement 13.Report 14.Search 15.Backup 16.Global setting 17.System admin 18.Inventory

Which covers all less than one roof especially for training institutes

Kindly login to www.campusmanage.com, to use our free software….
summary: Campusmanage is an advanced web based institute management system
